book.author: Gambardella, Matthew
book.title: XML Developer's Guide
book.review: An in-depth look at creating applications with XML.

book.author: Ralls, Kim
book.title: Midnight Rain
book.review: A former architect battles corporate zombies, an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen of the world.

book.author: Corets, Eva
book.title: Maeve Ascendant
book.review: After the collapse of a nanotechnology society in England, the young survivors lay the foundation for a new society.
